queryName: Undefined Scope 'securityScheme' On 'security' Field On Operations (v3)
descriptionText: Using an scope on security of operations that is undefined on 'securityScheme' can be defined by an attacker

2.0.descriptionText: Using an scope on security of operations that is undefined on 'securityDefinitions' can be defined by an attacker
